mapper.select: select j.`id`,j.`produc_num`,j.`produc_code`,j.`produc_name`,j.`mfrsid`,j.`brandid`,j.`brandnum`,j.`proid`,j.`unitid`,j.`sph_id`,j.`cyl_id`, j.`lightbelow_id`,j.`lens_id`,j.`batchid`,j.`light_id`,j.`gradual_id`,j.`refractivityid`,j.`function_id`,j.`tax`,j.`tax_price`, j.`trade_price`,j.`transfer_price`,j.`retail_price` ,j.`xsstate`,j.`state`,j.`classtype`,j.`produc_factory`, m.mfrsname,b.brandname,u.unitname,j.`view_good_name` from aa_jpcp j left join c_mfrs m on j.mfrsid=m.mfrsnum left join c_brand b on j.brandnum=b.brandnum AND j.`mfrsid`=b.`mfrsid` left join c_unit u on j.unitid= u.unitid where j.id = #{value}
mapper.delete:
delete from aa_jpcp where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select j.`id`,j.`produc_num`,j.`produc_code`,j.`produc_name`,j.`mfrsid`,j.`brandid`,j.`brandnum`,j.`proid`,j.`unitid`,j.`sph_id`,j.`cyl_id`, j.`lightbelow_id`,j.`lens_id`,j.`batchid`,j.`light_id`,j.`gradual_id`,j.`refractivityid`,j.`function_id`,j.`tax`,j.`tax_price`, j.`trade_price`,j.`transfer_price`,j.`retail_price`,j.`xsstate`,j.`state`,j.`classtype`,j.`produc_factory`, m.mfrsname,b.brandname,u.unitname,j.`view_good_name` from aa_jpcp j left join c_mfrs m on j.mfrsid=m.mfrsnum left join c_brand b on j.brandnum=b.brandnum AND j.`mfrsid`=b.`mfrsid` left join c_unit u on j.unitid= u.unitid left join a_cyl l on l.cyl_id=j.cyl_id left join a_sph s on s.sph_id=j.sph_id where j.`produc_num` = #{value}
select produc_num from aa_jpcp where produc_num=#{producNum} order by id
